website_summaries.verdict: A wide range of 15 shades in a  super creamy, creaseproof stick. Also great for travel and touch-ups on the go.
pros: Contains botanicals and antioxidants to smooth and protect the skin
Thick for good coverage, yet looks natural
The shade is a good match for the brand's foundation colors
cons: Some problems with getting this to blend, as it dries quickly

customer_reviews.title: Covers well
customer_reviews.text: I love this concealer. However, The shade I purchased was a little to dark for under my eyes. You always want to use a lighter concealer under your eyes so they appear brighter and more refreshed.
customer_reviews.author: JW1188

customer_reviews.title: Perfect coverage
customer_reviews.text: This works perfectly to go over and cover my red rosacea areas.
customer_reviews.author: ELIZABETH

customer_reviews.title: Good concealer
customer_reviews.text: I got a sample of this in one of my glam bags and decided to buy it. I do like the coverage but I must say I feel like I have put a pretty good amount under my eyes for it to conceal the dark circles. A little goes a long way isn’t a statement I would use with this product. With that being said I do like the look and feel of the concealer, even though I have to put a good amount on it doesn’t look cakey. Overall it is good.
customer_reviews.author: Renee L.

customer_reviews.title: real thing
customer_reviews.text: So excited to see Amazon carrying this.. Its not a fake Bare Minerals, it works great, looks good and a great price!
customer_reviews.author: ney

customer_reviews.title: Formula is nice
customer_reviews.text: Formula is nice. Definitely goes on smoothly. I’m not sure I would not define this product as full coverage and 16 hour coverage is quite a stretch.
customer_reviews.author: BrieM.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: It arrived with 90% of the product in the cap, broken off from the dispenser end.
customer_reviews.author: bkp

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: love this concealer amd then I can get free shipping with prime without a minimum purchase
customer_reviews.author: Avidreader

customer_reviews.title: My favorite concealer
customer_reviews.text: This product goes on easily and lasts most of the day. With the case it's easy to carry with and touch up as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Been using bare before it was in stores. Love this cover stick best one in the market
customer_reviews.text: Been using bare before it was in stores. Love this cover stick best one in the market Hormones autoimmune disease I’m 48 and my face is 13 again. Acne ya da. Best coverage ever.
customer_reviews.author: Laceykthoughts

customer_reviews.title: Best makep in the world
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE LOVE this concealer its light and doesn't make your fine lines on your face stick out like other. I LOVE MY BARE MINERALS if your going spend money on any skincare or makeup, baremineral is definitely worth it. I have tried all sorts of expensive to cheap makeup and I'm in my mid 30s and baremineral is the best. I recommend it for ages.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great with Sensitive Skin
customer_reviews.text: My skin is stupid sensitive. Even sunshine makes it break out. But I can use this with the companion products with no problems at all. This stick covers blemishes beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: C. Kauffman

customer_reviews.title: Decent dark circle coverage
customer_reviews.text: This works but I have to apply a lot and it’s easy to break the stick on it so you have to be careful. My bags under my eyes are very dark so this helps for now until I can find something that I don’t have to apply as much as. I just bought another stick today and it does cover up my dark circles but it can look chunky after a long day. I have bought This three times now.
customer_reviews.author: vicki

customer_reviews.title: Best under eye
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sight unseen and was hopeful. This product is amazing and I will purchase it again and again. It goes on smoothly without pulling the delicate eye area! It lasts all day! I have dark circles from long work hours and living in the Midwest all winter. It covers well and makes you appear well rested. I got lucky with the proper color choice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice concealer
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. I have rosacea and have sensitive skin which tolerates this gluten free product. It has nice coverage and blends easily. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: PeggyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great concealer for oilier skin
customer_reviews.text: TBH this is only the second concealer I've ever used but I LOVE it. So easy to apply and I have oilier skin so it being slightly drier is perfect for me. Conceals my under eyes really well! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Callie

customer_reviews.title: the right color and a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: I love bareMinerals products and this one is no exception. Was exactly as described the right color and a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Justin K.

customer_reviews.title: Very creamy and light!
customer_reviews.text: Love this concealer! The texture is very creamy and light but high coverage. The color was a little darker than my skin tone but still really like this product!
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie Knaak

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to use under the eyes
customer_reviews.text: This covers ok, but is difficult to blend under the eyes. I like that it has no scent.
customer_reviews.author: Dolly's mom

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: My sister introduced this to me, and I have loved it since. It brightens my eyes and I look like I actually got sleep the night before. A little miracle in twist up form!
customer_reviews.author: MomofMany4

customer_reviews.title: My favorite coverage product.
customer_reviews.text: The shade is perfect for my skin tone and it has staying power when wearing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Coverage..smooth and right tone
customer_reviews.text: I like it ...very smooth, good coverage and gentle around eyes. A bit costly.
customer_reviews.author: Rugby

customer_reviews.title: Good organizational product
customer_reviews.text: My handbags were on a high shelf, hard to organize and retrieve. Now they hang so I can reach them easily. And I can change them more often 😉
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Hill

customer_reviews.title: Awesome concealer!
customer_reviews.text: The best concealer yet! Covers well. Blends well. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Sue S.

customer_reviews.title: Best concealer
customer_reviews.text: It covers without being heavy and it's clean makeup. Yay.
customer_reviews.author: SHP

customer_reviews.title: I won’t purchase again
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed. It has the same coverage all the other drug store concealers. Nothing special
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Nice concealer, it is easy to use and covers well.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi

customer_reviews.title: Covers all of my blemishes
customer_reviews.text: My favorite concealer! Full coverage, easy to blend, non drying.
customer_reviews.author: A0703

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite concealer! I wish it didn’t run out so fast! Perfect shade and great coverage!
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Gentle on skin and cruelty- free!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used Bareminerals products for years - love the powder foundation and concealer !
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn Campagna

customer_reviews.title: Not as Expected
customer_reviews.text: What I expected was Bare Minerals Bareskin Concealer. This very tiny tube is dry and difficult to spread.
customer_reviews.author: LaJuana

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect if you need good coverage! I use for under my eyes and wear everyday! Love this product
customer_reviews.author: Leslie D.

customer_reviews.title: Applies easily
customer_reviews.text: Product goes only smoothly, doesn't tug the delicate under eye skin. I plan to purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and creamy texture
customer_reviews.text: I would buy this product again. I recommend it for older skin.
customer_reviews.author: evelyn emory

customer_reviews.title: One of the best!
customer_reviews.text: I love this concealer! Can wear alone or under makeup, amazing coverage, blends easy? Doesn’t crease, long lasting.
customer_reviews.author: NC

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product and easy to blend
customer_reviews.text: Stays put in the heat and pairs well with my other bare minerals products! Excellent for under eye darkness!
customer_reviews.author: lindsay larson

customer_reviews.title: Blends Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Love this concealer! have been looking for the right concealer for a long time that blends well. So easy to use as well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: The the bare mineral make up line. This goes on nice and covers my dark circles. It also last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa A Williams

customer_reviews.title: My go-to concealer
customer_reviews.text: I have tried other concealers based on reviews and nothing works better than this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Prompt arrival and I love this product. It’s my second order.:)
customer_reviews.author: camilla barneby

customer_reviews.title: Great item.
customer_reviews.text: The conceiler goes on very smoothly and feels light on.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Actually works!
customer_reviews.text: I love this concealer. It is light/Medium and a little darker than I wanted but it actually stays on! I have terrible allergies and get the worst black circles at times & sometimes use a primer and it stays overnight! Love it. Next time will try the lighter color.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia

customer_reviews.title: color is darker then name of color
customer_reviews.text: little bit hard to choice right color. i returned it. and it was too small amount in it compare with price.
customer_reviews.author: True mind

customer_reviews.title: Color to dark for light skin
customer_reviews.text: The product claim it is good for light and medium skin tone, but not really good for under eye. Under eye concealer should be lighter than other area of the skin . This product is not good for fair skin and lighter color skin and the coverage is week . I wish I can return it , but since I tried it on my skin already so I keep it. I will not use it for under eyes , and it is too small to use anywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: Melted
customer_reviews.text: I just got this today and I am trying to exchange it! It arrived melted in the bottle and looked like this. I am hoping the second time around will be better or I will return all together
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey Garland

customer_reviews.title: Be Careful made with metals.
customer_reviews.text: Both of my eyes swelled up, if your allergic to nickel or metals you could have a reaction.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Reuter

customer_reviews.title: Just not for me and my oily skin
customer_reviews.text: I love how creamy this product is and how easily it smooths over skin. But when I used this to cover up dark post-acne spots on my face, it just melted off throughout the day. Weirdly, this made my dark circles look very dry.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Great Cover!
customer_reviews.text: Love the NYX line of cosmetics because they are cruelty-free and priced nicely! I work this concealer in with the warmth of my fingers and it lasts all day. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: wendytime

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Makes even wrinkly under eye smooth looking. Goes on radiotherapy UN Love this product. Makes even wrinkled under eye smooth
customer_reviews.author: Gaga

customer_reviews.title: Great Concealer
customer_reviews.text: Bare minerals is what my wife perfers, great buying experience, quick ship and great price.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph E. Agabiti

customer_reviews.title: Concealer that stays on
customer_reviews.text: This concealer has medium coverage and good colors. I havent had a problem with it staying on my skin as I have had with other concealers.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie R.

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: So far I like it! Easy to put on and covers without looking "covered"!
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: It’s a great product
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved this product. Goes on nicely and doesn’t goop you in the lines by my eyes
customer_reviews.author: Linda Gabrielsen

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I really love this product. Goes on smooth and covers great.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: long lasting
customer_reviews.text: Love this - doesn’t sit in fine lines - it covers them
customer_reviews.author: anna r

product_meta.title: Bareminerals Barepro Concealer Light/Medium-Neutral 05, 0.09 Ounce
feature_bullets: Light/medium-neutral 05 - for light to medium skin WITH neutral undertones
